title: Smite-targeted
data:
***Version [0.30](/0.30 "0.30")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

**Smite-targeted** is a term used for spells and abilities that can target any entity in [line of sight](/Line_of_sight "Line of sight"), like the titular [Smiting](/Smiting "Smiting") spell, regardless of obstacles in the way. Specifically, they are spells with the *target* or *grid* [spell flags](/Spell_flags "Spell flags"). They are not interrupted by monsters or certain dungeon features like [iron grates](/Iron_grate "Iron grate"). However, transparent [walls](/Wall "Wall") block line of fire for the purpose of attacking.

Most spells with smite-targeting cannot miss; this is a property of each individual spell, rather than the targeting mode itself. For example, [Portal Projectile](/Portal_Projectile "Portal Projectile") doesn't suddenly make your [ranged weapons](/Ranged_weapons "Ranged weapons") perfectly accurate.

## Sources

These player usable [spells](/Spell "Spell") and actions are smite-targeted.

- [Airstrike](/Airstrike "Airstrike")
- [Haunt](/Haunt "Haunt")
- [Inner Flame](/Inner_Flame "Inner Flame")
- [Momentum Strike](/Momentum_Strike "Momentum Strike") (range 4)
- [Ranged combat](/Ranged_combat "Ranged combat") during [Portal Projectile](/Portal_Projectile "Portal Projectile")
- [Poisonous Vapours](/Poisonous_Vapours "Poisonous Vapours")
- [Yara's Violent Unravelling](/Yara%27s_Violent_Unravelling "Yara's Violent Unravelling")
- [Apportation](/Apportation "Apportation") (targets an object rather than a creature; objects can't pass through walls)

These spells have similar targeting rules, but can target any grid square, not just those that contain a creature.

- [Fire Storm](/Fire_Storm "Fire Storm") (range 5)
- [Freezing Cloud](/Freezing_Cloud "Freezing Cloud") (range 5)
- [Lee's Rapid Deconstruction](/Lee%27s_Rapid_Deconstruction "Lee's Rapid Deconstruction") (needs dungeon feature/stone monster)

### Monster Sources

A noncomprehensive list of monster spells with smite-targeting:

- [Airstrike](/Airstrike "Airstrike")
- [Call Down Damnation](/Call_Down_Damnation "Call Down Damnation")
- [Resonance Strike](/Resonance_Strike "Resonance Strike")
- [Smiting](/Smiting "Smiting")
- [Waterstrike](/Waterstrike "Waterstrike")

## Strategy

Monsters with smite-targeted spells are very dangerous, able to hit you while other enemies are in your way. Most enemy spells are made more dangerous by ignoring your [EV](/EV "EV") and [SH](/SH "SH"). [Smiting](/Smiting "Smiting") itself is a notorious killer of early characters. [Penetrating](/Penetration "Penetration") attacks or your own area-of-effect or smite-targeted attacks can get rid of pesky enemies.

Your own smite-targeted attacks can help when dealing with weak but supportive monsters, such as [boggarts](/Boggart "Boggart") or [moths of wrath](/Moths_of_wrath "Moths of wrath").
